title: Active and passive voice
objective: To learn conversion of sentence from Passive voice to Active voice and vice versa.
learningOutcome1: Student will able to learn about the conversion of sentence from passive voice to active voice.
learningOutcome2: Student will able to learn about the conversion of sentence from active voice to passive voice.
act1: In this activity, we are going to learn about the conversion of sentence from passive voice to active voice and vice versa.
act3: Understand the structure of the active voice and passive voice sentences.
act4: Convert the sentence from active voice to passive voice.
act5: Convert the sentence from passive voice to active voice.
act6: Click on "CHECK" to verify the converted sentence.
act7: The pop-up will show the result along with the explanation.
q_instr2: The quiz will start after clicking on the "OK" button, along with a timer.
q_instr3: To select an option as an answer to a given question, click on it.
q_instr4: You will get two attempts to select the correct option to the question.
q_instr5: You may skip the question if you want.
q_instr6: The score and timing are displayed on the top of the screen throughout the quiz.
q_instr7: You will get +1 for each correct answer. There is no negative marking.
q_instr8: The scorecard will be generated at the end of the quiz.
wawgtl: What are we going to learn?
aysywtq: Are you sure you want to quit?
